title: Teachers Lounge: Art, Technology, and Education
description:
Have you been using technology in your classroom? When is technology vital to teaching and learning, and when does it get in the way? Have you thought about how technology contributes to learning in and through the arts? Join us for an informal discussion of these questions and hear firsthand from other educators and technology experts about their experiences with educational technology tools. This workshop includes hands-on opportunities to try out selected platforms and apps.

Registration is required for this program.

For additional teacher workshops please visit the Teacher Programs calendar.

If you have any questions or special needs, please call (312) 443-9092 or e-mail teacherworkshops@artic.edu.
